${modID}:MagicDice.NAME: Magic Dice
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${modID}:Magics. NL Whenever #y${modID}:Magics is going to be less than #b1, gain #b1 [E] and draw #b1 card, change #y${modID}:Magics to #b1. NL At start of turn, if #y${modID}:Magics is greater than #b30, lose HP of #y${modID}:Magics minus 30 then play top card automatically, change #y${modID}:Magics to #b30. NL Card or relics with #y${modID}:Magic need a check( DC = #y${modID}:Magics ).

${modID}:GoodEating.NAME: Good Eating
${modID}:GoodEating.FLAVOR: Something U'd like to share to your friend.
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of battle, gain #b1 #y${modID}:Happy for every #y${modID}:Magic card in deck.

${modID}:MagicComputer.NAME: Magic Computer
${modID}:MagicComputer.FLAVOR: You know, our computer is expensive enouph, so it should never crash...At least I wish not to.
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of turn, take a check to gain [E] .

${modID}:MiddlePart.NAME: Middle Part
${modID}:MiddlePart.FLAVOR: Good hairstyle, magic man thinks so.
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of battle, gain #b3 #y${modID}:Magics and #y${modID}:Happy.

${modID}:EasternLeaf.NAME: Eastern Leaf
${modID}:EasternLeaf.FLAVOR: Maybe this is the least magic-like thing for magic man.
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of battle, pay #b10 gold to heal #b10 health if current health less than half of max health.

${modID}:SpeedingCar.NAME: Speeding Car
${modID}:SpeedingCar.FLAVOR: --This check is too difficult! --Start a speeding, magic man!
DESCRIPTIONS: The first check of each turn increases by 1d20.
